name: Jibe Mobile
tag_list: mobile, social, media, social-network, sharing, chat, addressbook
overview:
Jibe Mobile aims to make it easy to connect to your friends on social networks and share social media with them from your phone. The service lets you chat with all your contacts on Facebook or add your own You can also send Flickr photos, YouTube videos, and news stories.

Share any media. With any friend. Anywhere.

Some important features:

Real Time: Instant distribution of media to mobile, Web, and social network profiles / news feeds.

Rich Media: Jibe provides a simple interface for video, pictures, audio, RSS, text, etc. without the worry of phone memory or storage.

Seamless Experience: Jibe is platform agnostic, providing a seamless experience across mobile and Web with easy 2-step provisioning.

Social Interaction: Peer-to-peer chat, mail messaging, presence and fun viral interaction (shouts).

Broad Handset Support: 2.5 and 3G Java MIDP client, supporting over 130+ handsets including Blackberry. For legacy devices, Jibe offers a WAP viewing experience.

funding_rounds.source_description: Chat With Facebook Friends and Share Flickr Pics or YouTube Vids On Your Phone With Jibe Mobile (Invites)
